document.discussion_title: Technical analysis of Gold for August 22, 2016
document.topic_text: 22.08.2016 09:26 Technical analysis of Gold for August 22, 2016 Gold price is trading above the 61.8% Fibonacci retracement of the rise from $1,310. This is a short-term support that if broken combined with the triangle breakdown we should see some acceleration lower towards $1,310. Blue lines -triangle pattern Red line - long-term support Price is below the Ichimoku cloud in the 4 hour chart confirming bearish short-term trend. Support is at $1,332 and resistance at $1,351. Price has broken down out of the triangle and this is a bearish sign. Target is below $1,300 near $1,290. Show full picture Blue lines - bullish channel Price remains inside the long-term bullish channel but with signs of weakening up trend and time for a pull back at least towards the weekly kijun-sen near $1,280-$1,290. If the blue channel is broken expect the weekly cloud to be tested. InstaForex analytical reviews will make you fully aware of market trends!
